homepage.seo_subtitle: Mobile tyre, tyre change and repair service in Roeselare and surroundings.
homepage.seo_desc: Need a tyre change or repair? Costel Banden offers fast mobile tyre service in Roeselare and within 30 km. We intervene anytime!

images.caption: Speed and professionalism – mobile tire service right at your door!
Emergency interventions for your safety on the road.
Modern equipment and skilled staff – we change your tires wherever you need.
Choose premium services for your car – promptness, quality, transparency.
Costel Banden – your trusted partner for any unexpected situation.
Rain or shine, we reach you anywhere in Belgium!
Free consultancy and advice for tire maintenance.
A reputation built on seriousness and excellent results.
Local business with a big heart – for worry-free journeys!
